Anxious about US funding delay, Pacific Island nations warn about ChinaLeaders of strategic U.S.-allied Pacific Island nations have become increasingly anxious about the U.S. congressional budget impasse that has delayed approval of vital new funding packages and warned that China is actively seeking to shift their allegiances, including over Taiwan. Thu, 15 Feb 2024 20:14:04 GMT ELUYHJQIXVMG3A73B2QUVT6QBM https://www.reuters.com/world/anxious-about-us-funding-delay-pacific-island-nations-warn-about-china-2024-02-15/David Brunnstrom世界
Brazil sustainability rules should not make cars more expensive, Volkswagen saysBrazil's new incentive program to promote investment in sustainability by the country's auto sector needs to avoid making vehicles more expensive, Volkswagen's head of Brazil Ciro Possobom said. Thu, 15 Feb 2024 18:14:32 GMT QZUTZDIPR5OLRN2P66SLG75JEM https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/brazil-sustainability-rules-should-not-make-cars-more-expense-volkswagen-says-2024-02-15/Alberto Alerigi Jr.商业汽车与交通
Exclusive: Rubio urges SEC to block Shein IPO unless China operating risk disclosedRepublican Senator Marco Rubio asked the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission to block Shein’s bid to list publicly in New York unless the e-tailer makes additional disclosures about its business operations and "the serious risks of doing business" in China. Thu, 15 Feb 2024 17:03:22 GMT XKFENEI3AFN3BL7PJ6SSOZ3AKE https://www.reuters.com/markets/us/rubio-urges-sec-block-shein-ipo-unless-china-operating-risk-disclosure-2024-02-15/Katherine Masters可持续发展董事会、政策和法规
Ford, GM CEOs open to partnerships to compete with ChinaThe chief executives of U.S. automakers Ford and General Motors said on Thursday they would consider partnerships to cut electric vehicle technology costs as Chinese rivals move into the U.S. and European markets. Thu, 15 Feb 2024 15:12:49 GMT DHKTHKEV3BILVMI6IZ5U6QLEVQ https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/ford-ceo-open-working-with-rivals-compete-with-china-2024-02-15/Joseph White, Nathan Gomes可持续发展可持续财务与报告
Amid Rome spat, Stellantis CEO says Italy plants have a futureStellantis CEO Carlos Tavares said on Thursday the carmaker will need all of its Italian factories to hit its long-term production goal there, in conciliatory remarks that may ease tensions between the Fiat car maker and Rome. Thu, 15 Feb 2024 13:28:00 GMT DZOBY7GSZ5IXJEB3NZ7FWPA5II https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/amid-rome-spat-stellantis-ceo-says-italy-plants-have-future-2024-02-15/Giulio Piovaccari商业汽车与交通
European, US carmakers race to lower EVs costs as China competition heats upUnder pressure from Chinese competitors, major U.S. and European auto manufacturers are pushing hard to cut electric vehicle costs so they can have price tags and profit margins similar to those of fossil-fuel models, industry executives said on Thursday. Thu, 15 Feb 2024 13:03:54 GMT RJFIZZAOEBL7VL2STFJRTXEKHY https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/stellantis-renault-race-cut-costs-make-evs-more-affordable-2024-02-15/Nick Carey, Gilles Guillaume, Joseph White商业汽车与交通
Late show pushes Al-Hilal towards Asian CL quartersStoppage-time goals from Aleksandar Mitrovic and Abdullah Al Hamddan helped Al-Hilal come from behind to beat 10-man Sepahan of Iran 3-1 in Isfahan on Tuesday and move a step closer to the Asian Champions League quarter-finals. Thu, 15 Feb 2024 12:15:09 GMT U77SJJUKRVOFXHRXN7NLNDTOJY https://www.reuters.com/sports/soccer/joos-brace-moves-ulsan-verge-asian-champions-league-quarters-2024-02-15/Michael Church运动的足球
Cold snap expected in China as millions return from Lunar New Year tripsA cold snap is forecast to sweep across many parts of China from this weekend, with temperatures falling by up to 20 degrees Celsius as millions return from Lunar New Year trips, the national observatory said on Thursday.
